official_title: A bill to apply a reduced rate of duty to certain dried egg yolk processed from eggs produced in the United States and exported to Canada for use in the manufacture of lysozyme.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to apply a reduced rate of duty on certain dried egg yolk processed from eggs produced in the United States and exported to Canada for use in the manufacture of lysozyme.

titles.title: A bill to apply a reduced rate of duty to certain dried egg yolk processed from eggs produced in the United States and exported to Canada for use in the manufacture of lysozyme.
